attributes.action: Extend the age for persons to apply to become a Magistrate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The discrimination of a British Subject to apply to become a Magistrate is at present limited by age to 65.Considering the breadth of experience and the willingness for this retired person to take on this grave responsibility should make  health and ability the deciding factor - not age.Also consideration should be given to Magistrates being in attendance at Police Stations Fri - Sun to deal with miscreants immediately.This would allow Police to give immediate verbal evidence; thereby saving time and money.
